{{{users}}}
{ "params": { "users": { "label": "Users", "description": "The formatted list of users", "type": "content", "suggested": true } }, "description": "This template is used to show a list of users", "format": "block", "paramOrder": [ "users" ] }

{{#if:{{{image_file|}}}|
[[File:{{{image_file}}}]]
}}
[[User:{{{user_name}}}|{{{display_name}}}]]
{{#if:{{{roles|}}}|
{{{roles}}}
}}
{ "params": { "user_name": { "label": "User name", "description": "The user name for the user", "type": "content", "required": true }, "display_name": { "label": "Display name", "description": "The display name for the user", "type": "content", "suggested": true }, "image_file": { "label": "Image file name", "description": "The file name of the image for the user", "type": "wiki-file-name", "suggested": true }, "roles": { "label": "Role(s)", "description": "The role(s) of this user", "type": "content", "suggested": true } }, "description": "This widget is used to show a users name, image, and roles", "format": "block", "paramOrder": [ "user_name", "display_name", "image_file", "roles" ] }

{{{users}}}
{ "params": { "users": { "label": "Users", "description": "The formatted list of users", "type": "content", "suggested": true } }, "description": "This template is used to show a list of users", "format": "block", "paramOrder": [ "users" ] }

• [[User:{{{user_name}}}|{{{display_name}}}]]
    • { "params": { "user_name": { "label": "User name", "description": "The user name", "type": "content", "required": true }, "display_name": { "label": "Display name", "description": "The display name for the user", "type": "content", "suggested": true } }, "description": "This template is used to generate an item for use in a list of users", "format": "block", "paramOrder": [ "user_name", "display_name" ] }
